titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an John Maynard Keynes, [1923]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der King's College Library in Cambridge; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (Letters, S. 113; deutsch: Briefe, S. 126; Cambridge Letters, S. 185; WiC, S. 138).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Thanks so much for sending me the "Reconstruction in Europe". I should have preferred though to have got a line from you personally, saying how you are getting on, etc. Or, are you too busy to write letters? I don't supose you are. Do you ever see Johnson? If so, please give him my love. I should so much like to hear from him too (not about my book but about himself).
So do write to me sometime, if you will condescend to do such a thing.
